output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Present: Yes (CMF 11240014) - This indicates it's electoral material 2. Direct Reference to Candidates: Yes - Mentions George Simion directly - Also mentions PNL and PSD in a negative context 3. Addresses Wide Population: Yes - Paid Facebook advertisement - Uses broad messaging about national economy - Targets a very large audience (1,000,001+ estimated) 4. Electoral Objective: Yes - Explicit call to vote ("votați AUR și George Simion președinte") - Contains campaign promises and political positioning - Criticizes other parties (PSD and PNL) 5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains partisan messaging and direct calls to action 6. Personal Opinion: No - This is a structured political message with CMF number - Paid advertisement with clear campaign objectives
This is clearly electoral propaganda because it: - Has official campaign material identifier (CMF) - Makes direct calls to vote for a specific candidate - Criticizes other political entities - Is being promoted after the end of the presidential campaign period

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is definitely electoral propaganda as it contains all elements defined in Article 36(7): - Direct reference to candidates and parties - Electoral objective (call to vote) - Addresses wide public - Contains CMF number - Is a paid promotion
conclusion.message-for-police: Adrian Axinia, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1720075795393117) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul contine indemnuri explicite de vot pentru candidatul George Simion la presedintie, criticarea directa a contracandidatilor, si foloseste număr oficial de material electoral CMF 11240014. Postarea este promovată activ prin plată pe Facebook, cu un buget între 100-199 RON și o audiență estimată de peste 1 milion de persoane, reprezentând astfel o încălcare clară a prevederilor legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
